comments.body: I don't think it's a compile error, but a warning, which might be new in 2.12. I tried to fix up a bunch of these in https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/cfbdd6a1f5906b848c520d3365cc4034992215d9 for example.

> branch-2.2 is fine, but branch-2.3 should be fixed.
